name: Kyfighter
description:
Kyfighter is a endless space-themed multidirectional shooter browser game,based on Asteroids arcade game from 1981.The player controls a single spaceship in an asteroid field and the object of the game is to shoot and destroy the asteroids,while not colliding with them.The score of the game is set as random interger between 1-100,so when You destroy the asteroid no matter how,it will interger between 1-100.The end of the game is when player's health reach 0.This game will be updated from time to time with new spaceships and some changes without in game purchases,since You can support the developer for making the game.

CONTROLS A

W-Up
S-Back
A-Left
D-Right
J-Shoot

ESC-Pause

CONTROLS B

Arrow Up-Up
Arrow Down-Back
Arrow Left-Left
Arrow Right-Right
Z-Shoot

ESC-Pause
